value.title: Create Intelligent Bots with the Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a chat bot and add intelligence to the Bot by integrating QnA Maker and LUIS.

topItems.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
topItems.excerpt: Bots are a popular way to provide support through multiple communication channels. This module describes how to use the QnA Maker service and Azure Bot Service to create a bot that answers user questions.

images.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI.

images.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Introduction to AI technology for business leaders
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will be provided with a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI. You will be able to describe what AI happens to be and the technologies that underpin it. You will be able to share  how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

topItems.title: Introduction to AI technology
topItems.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

topItems.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
topItems.excerpt: This module is a starting point for business decision makers who want to understand how Microsoft is creating products, services, and solutions to help organizations leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI). We’ll also help you understand how these technologies relate to business problems.

images.title: Examine the Microsoft approach to artificial intelligence
Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

images.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

images.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine

value.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service
value.excerpt: Bots are a popular way to provide support through multiple communication channels. This module describes how to use the QnA Maker service and Azure Bot Service to create a bot that answers user questions.

images.title: Build a bot with QnA Maker and Azure Bot Service

value.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
value.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Implement the publish-subscribe pattern in the cloud using Azure Queue storage.

images.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)

images.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create a language model with Language Understanding
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model.

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

value.title: Enable reliable messaging for Big Data applications using Azure Event Hubs
value.excerpt: Connect sending and receiving applications with Event Hubs so you can handle extremely high loads without losing data.

images.title: Enable reliable messaging for Big Data applications using Azure Event Hubs

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Azure App Service enables you to build and host web applications in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure. Learn how to create a website through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

images.title: Host a web application with Azure App service

value.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
value.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase

value.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
value.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

value.title: Introduction to AI technology
value.excerpt: This module provides a high-level overview of the primary concepts of AI and the technologies behind it. We then dive into how Microsoft is turning the latest advancements in AI into tools, products, and services that can be leveraged by organizations.

images.title: Introduction to AI technology

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Determine the types of business problems that can be solved using Azure Kubernetes Service. Describe the benefits of container orchestration with features like deployment management, automatic updates, and self-healing.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service

value.title: Keep your virtual machines updated
value.excerpt: Deploy the Azure Update Management solution to update virtual machines in your cloud environment.

images.title: Keep your virtual machines updated

value.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Use API management to control who uses your APIs, to enforce usage policies, and to present a professional front-end to developers using the API.

images.title: Publish and manage your APIs with Azure API Management

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure your Azure SQL Database to keep your data secure and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

images.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database

value.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI – and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: SQL elastic pools allow you to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

images.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Storing and handling secrets, encryption keys, and certificates directly is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of unintentional data exposure. Azure Key Vault provides a secure storage area for managing all your app secrets so you can properly encrypt your data in transit or while it's being stored.

images.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management
value.excerpt: Discover how to protect your APIs from unauthorized use with API keys and client certificate authentication.

images.title: Control authentication for your APIs with Azure API Management

value.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server
value.excerpt: Azure Database for PostgreSQL provides fully managed, enterprise-ready community PostgreSQL database as a service. Learn how to create and deploy this service and connect it to your applications.

images.title: Create an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server

value.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
value.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
